meanings.definition: An abnormal accumulation of serous fluid in the tissues or in a body cavity.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hydropsy after noticing the swelling in their legs.
meanings.sent2: Hydropsy can cause discomfort and difficulty in movement due to the excess fluid retention.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal at the party seemed to have a case of hydropsy, looking overly inflated.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt heavy with hydropsy, as if it was drowning in a sea of fluid.
meanings.sent5: The image of the water balloon bursting symbolized the sudden release of hydropsy, flooding the area.
